name: First Dimension Racing
description:
Created for the Mix And Game Jam where the theme was Dimension Change.

So the idea is to play a "1D racing game" where all you can do is accelerate or brake. Corners are handled by the game itself.

In order to accelerate you click the screen. In order to gear up, you click above your last click. To brake you need to click below previous click.

Take the corners at 25-60 km/h for best results, good luck!
